name: ORB - OWL Refactoring Browser
short_description: ORB (OWL Refactoring Browser) provides functionality for creation, maintenance and evolution of OWL-based ontologies. Core is the sophisticated refactoring engine that allows for easier ontology and cross-ontology behavior-preserving transformations.
